case.title: 500 A MONTH R U AN EBONY WOMAN WHO FITS MY POSTING - 52 (LONG ISLAND)
case.text: NO PAY FOR PLAY HO S SLUTS SCAMMERS or RIP OFS WOMEN WITH KIDS OR CRAZY XXXS ARE YOU EDUCATED ENJOYS WORKING OUT IN SCHOOL OR WORKING UNDER 5-6 130LBS WELL GROOMED OVER 25 Y O NONSMOKER DDFREE LIVE ON LONG ISLAND DRIVES OR WILLING TO TRAVEL i am just a hard working man who is seeking some fun company conversation chemistry fun i am in shape nonsmoker ddfree no kids dont need blue pills lol if you enjoy the beach movies music events good food lets talk exchange photos let the fun begin please put your age the town you live in the subject line so i know your real
